statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 24 \\ -20 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -7 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ -84 \\ 75 \\ -5 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
